name: Lutron
0:
”Alexa, set the living room lights to 80 percent”
”Alexa, open the bedroom shades”
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen ceiling fan”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Lutron brings the convenience of smart lighting control to your home while working seamlessly with Alexa to provide control of your Caséta, RA2 Select, or HomeWorks system with your voice.

You — or anyone in your family — can tell Alexa to turn lights and fans on, off, or adjust them to your favorite level. You can also ask Alexa to raise and lower your Lutron shades, or set them to any level you want. To control multiple lights, fans, and shades through a single voice command, just ask Alexa to turn on your favorite scene. Need to be quiet? Use your Lutron Pico remote or keypad for those moments when silence is golden.

To add smart lighting control to your home, you’ll need a Smart Bridge, main repeater, or processor linked to a Lutron account and have at least one dimmer, switch, fan control or shade associated with it. To create a Lutron account, download the Lutron App from Google Play or the App Store and tap "Get Started."

If you have any questions or need assistance, please reach out at any time to our free 24/7 support team at systemsupport@lutron.com / 1.844.588.7661.

*NOTE – If you have a RadioRA2 or HomeWorks QS system with a Lutron Connect Bridge, please use the Lutron Connect skill. See http://tinyurl.com/connectalexa for more details.
